hr.fer.zesoi.bioinfo.models

Class Read

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zesoi.bioinfo.models.Read

  • public class Read
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single read. Since we don't need the exact bases in the algorithm, this class only has the length of the read, its id in the input file, and a list of edges representing overlaps between reads.
    Author:
    Bioinfo team
